title: Digital Art
body:
Hello Everyone & Riot employees 

i am starting to do digital art and i need help to improve my digital art skills. So i was wondering if anyone could tell me any advice on what i could do to improve my artworks. 

Much thanks Skybax

replies.body: you'd have to link your art if anyone is going to help you... LOL
why are you posting this on the LoL boards... in no way is this relevant
